CaseProgram.name: CaseProgram
CaseProgram.description: Represents the junction between Case and Program objects.

CaseId.description: The identifer of the case that’s associated with the program.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The date when the record was last viewed.

Name.description: The name of the case program.

ProgramId.description: The identifier of the program that’s associated with the case.
